content: you re 2 3 inches from one corner on your final round fold the corner over the teething ring use slip stitches to secure the fold around the ring being careful not to twist once the corner is secured continue crocheting the rest of the round as usual fasten_off and weave in all ends securely we d love to see what you make tag us on instagram @cedarhillfiberfarm cedarhillfiberfarm com claudia gross 3 of 3
